quest.name: Beyond the Clouds
journal: Alphinaud ponders the means by which you might find Hraesvelgr.

As Alphinaud muses on how the party can best locate Hraesvelgr, Ysayle exclaims in surprise at the sight of a moogle. The creature is startled into flight, and the party sets off in pursuit, determined to question the moogle on the whereabouts of the great wyrm. Speak with Alphinaud, and learn if he has spotted your hopefully informative quarry.
You have lost sight of the moogle. Survey the area, and attempt to catch a glimpse of the frightened creature.
You scan the area, but can find no sign of the elusive moogle. Return to Alphinaud, and report your failure.
You inform Alphinaud of your failure to find the moogle, and Alphinaud begins to wonder if the creature ever existed in the first place. Could your quarry be concealing himself with magic...?
objectives: Search for the moogle at the designated locations.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Now that we have scaled the mountain, there remains the problem of finding Hraesvelgr himself...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: What manner of creature is that...?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Forename. Do my eyes deceive me, or was that a moogle?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It was my understanding that they only dwelled within the Twelveswood. I certainly never expected to see one in the Churning Mists...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If the moogle does live here, however, he may know where Hraesvelgr makes his lair. Quickly, now, before we lose the creature completely!

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: This place is far from the barren mountaintop I pictured in my mind...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: Well, dragoon? Do you believe these ruins were also built by heretics to deceive the faithful of Ishgard?

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: How can one not be moved by such a breathtaking sight...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Bah, he's gone! Forename, we must widen our search.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: A “moogle,” did you say? I am unfamiliar with the breed, but I shall search for one nonetheless...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We did see a moogle, did we not...?

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: I see no evidence of this moogle of yours. Are you certain it wasn't a trick of the light? Mayhaps 'twas simply one of these strange plants, shifting in a breeze...

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: I have heard tales of these moogles, but 'tis the first time I've ever laid eyes on one. They are rather adorable, aren't they?

dialogue.name: ICEHEART
dialogue.text: What─ Why do you stare at me so? Can I not find a creature adorable? My heart is not truly made of ice...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is no sign of a moogle in the area...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I'm sure I glimpsed the moogle fleeing in this direction. Could he be concealing himself with magic...?
